# Arbitrum ERC-721 Wormhole Bridge

The token bridge from Wormhole Protocol has been used to bridge the following ERC-721 token of NUT Ecosystem deployed on Ethereum: 

- **Nuts (NUTS)**: [0x88266f9eb705F5282a2507A9c418821a2AC9f8BD](https://etherscan.io/token/0x88266f9eb705F5282a2507A9c418821a2AC9f8BD#code)

All ERC-721 contracts bridged on Arbitrum by Wormhole Protocol use currently (17.03.2024) the following upgradable contracts, under Apache License 2.0 (available here):

- **NFTBridgeEntrypoint.sol**: 

1) Deployed on Arbitrum: [0x3dd14d553cfd986eac8e3bddf629d82073e188c8](https://arbiscan.io/address/0x3dd14d553cfd986eac8e3bddf629d82073e188c8#code) 
2) Deployed on Ethereum: [0x6ffd7ede62328b3af38fcd61461bbfc52f5651fe](https://etherscan.io/address/0x6ffd7ede62328b3af38fcd61461bbfc52f5651fe#code)

On Arbitrum, this NFTBridgeEntrypoint.sol proxy implements  currently (17.03.2024, available here):

- **NFTBridgeImplementation.sol**: [0x92984f4023f2b40d5b70980f383860492f02019e](https://arbiscan.io/address/0x92984f4023f2b40d5b70980f383860492f02019e#code)

On Arbitrum, This NFTBridgeImplementation.sol contract is currently (17.03.2024) linked to the following NFT implementation (available here):

- **NFTImplementation.sol**: [NFTImplementation](https://arbiscan.io/address/0xC8e2b0cD52Cf01b0Ce87d389Daa3d414d4cE29f3#code)

**Sources:**
- [Wormhole Portal Bridge](https://portalbridge.com/advanced-tools/#/nft)
- [Wormhole Foundation Github](https://github.com/wormhole-foundation) 

## Nuts (NUTS) on Arbitrum 

Nuts (NUTS) has been bridged on Arbitrum via the following Wormhole proxy (available here): 

- **BridgeNFT.sol**: [0xa844cb1b558625c8a6214d460f2fcfa599eb464a](https://arbiscan.io/address/0xa844cb1b558625c8a6214d460f2fcfa599eb464a#code)

This BridgeNFT.sol proxy is linked to the NFTBridgeEntrypoint.sol (0x3dd14d553cfd986eac8e3bddf629d82073e188c8) proxy which is currently linked to the NFTImplementation.sol (available here).

### Process for Contract Verification of Nuts (NUTS) on Arbitrum 

- **Compiler Version**: v0.8.4+commit.c7e474f2

- **Optimization Enabled**: 1

- **Runs**: 200

- **Constructor Arguments Used (ABI-encoded)**: (equals to `bytes memory constructorArgs` used in `create2(...)` from `_createWrapped(...)` called in `completeTransfer(...)` from NFTBridgeImplementation.sol)

```code

```

- **ContractName:**: BridgeNFT.sol

- **ContractBytecode:**:


